name: Ragdolls Sandbox
description:
Ragdolls Sandbox is physics simulation sandbox.
This game provides the players a great degree of creativity to interact with.Our ragdolls in the game are totally physics based, you will have the expectation of interaction with the environment. It gives you a whole new avenue of fun. You can create your own mini games with or without predetermined goal. And you will gain the freedom to be creative with your gameplay.

Thank you for playing this game !
